description: A comprehensive task management application with user authentication and real-time collaboration

features.name: UserAuthentication
features.description: User registration, login, and profile management with secure token-based authentication

features.name: TaskManagement
features.description: Create, edit, delete, and organize tasks with categories and priorities

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Overview dashboard showing task statistics and progress

features.name: CollaborationService
features.description: Real-time collaboration features for team task management

features.name: NotificationManager
features.description: Push notifications for task reminders and updates

features.name: DataSyncUtil
features.description: Utilities for data synchronization and offline support
